---
title: "Sex analysis"
format: html
---

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(tibble)
library(here)
```

```{r}
df <- read.csv(here("data", "med_data_tidy.csv"))
df
```

```{r}
age_model <- lm(death ~ age, data = df)
age_df <- tibble(
  group = "age",
  model = list(age_model)
)


saveRDS(age_df, here("data", "models", "age.RDS"))


readRDS(here("data", "models", "age.RDS"))

```
